name: Intense 2020 Primer S Pro Bike - Unisex
description: Get extra experimental on technical trail cuz it's slash and dash time. This trail bike's staggered 279 geometry combines a 29er wheel on the front with a 27.5 rear wheel. The result is a rowdy rig that cleans tight turns, but still bumps confidently on loose trails or chunky rock gardens. The drive train delivers punchy insta-power, with crisp gear changes exactly when you want it. Impressively spec'd with Fox Factory 36 and DPX2 shocks, this trail bike handles technical descents like a pro.Full carbon frame scales down the weight while keeping your ride feel nimble and agile.Agressive enduro/trail geometry gives a 65.1 degree headtube angle.Internal cable routing keeps shifter, seatpost and brake cables tidy.FOX Factory 36 fork (3-pos) absorbs shock with 150mm of travel.FOX Factory DPX2 (3-pos) handles well on small or big bumps with 140mm of travel.Truvativ Stylo 32T crankset gives you lively power on hills, bumps or loose sections.Shimano XT hydraulic disc brakes provide powerful all-conditions braking.SRAM GX Eagle shifters give responsive gear changes.SRAM X01 Eagle rear derailleur provides quick gear changes.SRAM GX chain provides smooth drive power on a 12-speed 11-50T cassette.FOX Transfer seatpost offers 125mm (S) 150mm (M/L) or 175mm (XL) of travel.Front tire: Maxxis Minion DHR II 29 x 2.6.Rear tire: Maxxis Rekon+ 27.5 x 2.8.Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your Intense Bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for 1 year after purchase.Includes an Intense gift box with over $150 of free stuff – like a torque wrench set, shock pump and extra valve stems for going tubeless.Based in Temecula, California, Intense Cycles have been building aggressive, game-changing and flat-out rad mountain bikes since 1993."
